section.title: Zooming in to a Chart Widget

procedure.title: To Zoom in to a Chart Widget

step.para:
From the chart widget that you want to enlarge, click
(Zoom in on this chart) in the upper right corner of the widget.

formalpara.title: Result:
formalpara.para:
The enlarged chart is opened in its own pop-up window. To close this window, click
(Close) in the upper right corner.
